actionfx-core
  • All Classes
 

Package com.github.actionfx.core.view.graph

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NodeVisitor
    Functional handler for applying some logic during scene graph traversal.
    NodeWrapper.NodeAttacher
    Interface for attaching a node to the node wrapper's children at a specified position.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControlWrapper
    Wrapper around a Control in order to have a unique access to its values.
    NodeWrapper
    Wrapper around a Node (or other objects inside a scene graph, e.g.
    NodeWrapper.AnchorPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node inside an AnchorPane.
    NodeWrapper.BorderPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node in a BorderPane.
    NodeWrapper.ColRowAttacher
    Specialized attacher for GridPane nodes, where the node can be attached at a specified column and row.
    NodeWrapper.DefaultAttacher
    Simple attacher that supports single child wrapper like ScrollPane (and its content property) as well as node derived from Parent.
    NodeWrapper.ListAttacher
    Attaches a node to a list at a specified position.
    NodeWrapper.ListFirstAttacher
    Attaches a node as first element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.ListLastAttacher
    Attaches a node as last element to a list.
